data.title: School Websites, Communications & Enrollment Platform
data.meta_description: Finalsite is the first community relationship management platform for K-12 schools, transforming how schools attract students, engage families, and build community.
data.text:
Each scroll reveals the joy and engagement of students, showcasing the lively and connected atmosphere of boarding life at this independent school. With full-panel videos, impactful testimonials, and an engaging user experience, each click goes deeper into the inspiring stories of students, the connected community, and the powerful mission of the school.

EXPLORE DESIGN

The storytelling on this website evokes the warm-fuzzies families need most — complete with videos, superintendent quotes, student features and news. Plus, it inspires prospective faculty during a time where teacher recruitment is key!

EXPLORE DESIGN

Baylor's site is a journey — horizontal scrolls, split columns, and sliding panels take users on the adventure of what it's like to "Be Baylor" — inspired, curious, independent, challenged, and more.

"Baylor Leads" is felt with every click and scroll— with campus highlights, branded colors, imagery, and graphics, the homepage captures students and faculty making the most of every moment on campus as a boarding or day student. Take a look; it's truly a site that feels purposeful as much as it looks beautiful.

EXPLORE DESIGN

Legacy Early College's innovative and purposeful school website has a bold and vibrant mobile-first design that is both beautiful and functional. The website has numerous features that drive admissions and family retention, including an interactive Health and Nutrition design panel that highlights a Legacy differentiator: a commitment to nutritional health for students and faculty.

EXPLORE DESIGN

Whitgift is an independent day and boarding school in South Croydon for students ages 10-18. Founded in 1596, the all-boys school is known for its IB programme and academic success, broad co-curricular programme, and unique campus atmosphere — which includes peacocks and other exotic animals on the campus grounds.

EXPLORE DESIGN

Gratz College offers blended and fully-online degrees for students across the United States and internationally. Looking to offer its school community an improved, interactive website experience, the college's custom-designed website includes a custom course catalog, filterable by program and semester, as well as data integration with Blackbaud's enrollment management system. Score!

EXPLORE DESIGN

Cor Jesu Academy's custom design appeals to parents and teenage girls alike — a difficult feat, for sure! Animated graphics and bold colors bring the school's beaming catholic community to life online. Plus, the school leverages Blackbaud's data integration with Finalsite to get the best of both worlds: great design and powerful data!

EXPLORE DESIGN
